HLAE 2.180.0 2025-03-03T20:00Z
Included AfxHookSource 1.131.0 (2025-03-03T20:00Z). Updated HLAE installer FFMPEG version, see comments below regarding bug workaround. Added FAQ link in help menu and re-ordered the menu. Added dismissible warnings from download page to GUI.
There's a known bug with HLAE_Setup.exe when upgrading from an older HLAE version to a newer one and reinstalling the newer FFMPEG: It will install the newer FFMPEG and then install over that the older one again. This issue can be worked around by doing a repair install (run newest HLAE_Setup.exe one more time and chose repair).

// Example for mirv_input smooth:
// For key assignment see: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/Source%3Amirv_input#mirv_input-camera (New mouse buttons (left / right) + mousemove and mousewheel are not documented there yet.)
mirv_input cfg ksens 1
mirv_input cfg msens 0.05
mirv_input cfg smooth halfTime 0.5 // sets all half life time for vec (position), and (rotation), fov (field of view) to same value in seconds.
// Uncomment to set independently:
//mirv_input cfg smooth halfTimeVec 0.5
//mirv_input cfg smooth halfTimeAng 0.5 // Tip: Use 0 value to disable smoothing, or use e.g. 0.1 value for lower delay and less smoothing.
//mirv_input cfg smooth halfTimeFov 0.5
//mirv_input cfg smooth rotShortestPath 0 // Uncomment / try this on 0 when bored, default 1 is cooler, but already snaps at 180Â°.
alias "afx_smooth_on" "mirv_input cfg smooth enabled 1; mirv_input cfg offsetMode ownLast; mirv_input cfg mouseMoveSupport 1; mirv_input camera"
alias "afx_smooth_off" "mirv_input end; mirv_input cfg offsetMode last; mirv_input cfg mouseMoveSupport 0; mirv_input cfg smooth enabled 0"
afx_smooth_on
echo "enter afx_smooth_off to turn smooth off"

People using custom loader will need to add the following lines in environment variables section (and might need to adjust the path to the Steam folder):
SteamPath=C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam
SteamClientLaunch=1
SteamGameId=730
SteamAppId=730
SteamOverlayGameId=730 Installer improvements:
- Closes #351 HLAE_Setup.exe / Installer:
- Easier to find option to change folder
- License conditions removed, since there are none
- Option to remove APPDATA folder
- Closes #356 (ffmpeg / installer related):
- Repeated installations don't need to reinstall FFMPEG if not wanted.
- Allows selecting existing FFMPEG installation
- Allows to select different builds.

If this is a problem for you, or you are unsure, you can use the previous HLAE 2.53.1 (2018-08-07T06:15Z) until the situation calms down.
If you are using Windows Defender and run into problems:
1) Make sure to install the latest definitions: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/wdsi/definitions

Added -noGui option for -csgoLauncher, -afxHookGoldSrc and -customLoader command line options:
When specified the HLAE.exe GUI won't be started at all - since HLAE exits as soon as the requested operations have been carried out, it's not possible to tell errors that might happen later on in the game / target process being launched. You can check the HLAE.exe process ExitCode to determine if the requested operations are being carried out successful so far (0) or failed for sure (1).

Reverted to old injection method, since otherwise there will be even more trouble with the UCRT again (on systems where it is not present, basically several UCRT DLLs ignore the alternate DLL search order). Combined it partially with new method, so we hopefully get the best result possible.
HLAE 2.14.6 2016-08-24T17:30Z
Fixed HLAE injection method causing Windows to load potentially incompatible DLLs from the system folders (i.e. vcruntime140.dll) instead of those supplied in the HLAE folder. Please note: We cannot do much about ucrtbase.dll and similar DLLs being loaded from the Windows folder if present there at the moment: https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/details/2725185/ucrt-function-forwarders-ignore-setdlldirectory-and-make-it-unsuitable-for-side-by-side-deployment

Fixed 64 bit versions of msvcp100.dll, msvcr100.dll being packaged instead of 32 bit versions.
Updated launcher for GoldSrc games (AfxHookGoldSrc) to display a warning icon and information if game resolution height is bellow 480 pixels, since then the Half-Life's TrackerScheme.res would need to be adjusted aka an EngineFont for bellow 480 pixels would need to be added, otherwise text (i.e. death notice text) will be missing in-game.

HLAE 2.4.6.3 2015-05-14T17:54Z
Fixed writing of hlaeconfig.xml failing randomly, due to the file stream for reading it not being closed deterministically beforehand.
We are aware of a small number of Windows 8 / 8.1 users that have random crashes and freezes (i.e. when loading a demo) with HLAE / AfxHookSource.
If you are affected by it, consider contacting us in the appropriate forum thread: http://advancedfx.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1666

HLAE pre-release 2.0.0.0 2008-03-21
Changed: The MDT project has now been renamed to Half-Life Advanced Effects (HLAE)
Added: The HLAE Graphical User Interface, which will be extended in the future. The GUI is based on wxWidgets ( http://www.wxwidgets.org/ ).
Changed: The MDTloader has been integrated into the HLAE Gui. Select File->Launch from the menu to bring it up.
Added: DemoTools: select Tools->Demo Tool form the menu.
This tool migrates 2 old tools into the GUI:
DemoCleanup by MirvinMonkey:
Remove scoreboard, commandmenu, ...
Added ability to block other commands too.
Half-Life Demo Fix by ripieces:
Repair demos that were recorded while the game crashed. Added ability to repair more than 2 segments.
And adds a new one:
dem_forcehltv 1 camera stuck fix:
Tries to fix the camera being stuck when using dem_forcehltv 1 with some in-eye demos.
Included AfxHookGoldSrc 2.0.0.0 (2008-03-21).
As always the following text contains many mistakes (as most changelog entries) due to lack of time and dedication to writing changelogs.
Thanks to: Everyone (including you). iD Software, matrixstorm, MetaMod, Microsoft, Valve Software, wxWidgets. Uwe Gierlich for his informations about the Half-Life .dem file format. Mirvin_Monkey for creating the former MDT. neomic for his enormous work on the HLAE Gui. Myself (ripieces) for wasting so much time on this project.

Hello, this is a special Christmas release :D
At first we want to hint you to the HLAEwiki*, which already contains the Mirv Demo Tool command reference and will be extended in the future: http://www.hhg-clan.de/hlae/wiki
Along some bonus tools you normally have to download separately (check the bonus folder in the zip) we also added some sweet extra candy to MDT itself:
A built-in WallHack system : P
Thanks and greets too:
C-M|s0nkite ( www.mattepainting.gr )
for supplying the merry_xmas.jpg that is included in the download!
msthavoc ( www.mst-gaming.de )
for helping now and then with testing mdt and making tutorials :)
Merry X-Mas to you guys then,
have fun, cya next year.
* it's HLAEwiki, because MDT might get renamed in the far away future to Half-Life Advanced Effects : )
